title: 中文
content:
一个人死了，还会有人想起他，就算不错。
 —— 汪曾祺
  做了人类想成仙；生在地上要上天。
 —— 鲁迅

title: English
content:
Information is physical.
 by Rolf Landauer
  As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality.
 by Albert Einstein

title: Blog
content: This is the first try to create an article to show on my website.
